channel.title: Programs on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Programs on My New Hugo Site

item.title: 后端Dom库操作
item.description: 各语言解析超文本语言

item.title: node 解析html 文本
item.description: 获取h1标签 function TestPrintH1(){ const content = ` <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Document</title> </head> <body> <h1>hello dom html</h1> </body> </html> ` const $ = cheerio.load(content) const h1Html = $('h1').html() const expectH1Html = `hello dom html2` assert.equal(h1Html, expectH1Html) }

item.title: golang 解析 html 文本
item.description: goquery 入门 goquery 库 可以用来解析超文本文件内容，用来方便的分析相关内容 获取h1标签 func TestPrintH1(t *testing.T) { content := ` <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Document</title> </head> <body> <h1>hello dom html</h1> </body> </html> ` doc, err := goquery.NewDocumentFromReader(strings.NewReader(content)) if err != nil { t.Fatal(err) } h1Html, err := doc.FindMatcher(goquery.Single("h1")).Html() assert.NoError(t, err) expectH1Html := `hello dom html` assert.Equal(t, expectH1Html, h1Html) } 向head标签中追加script标签 func TestHeadInsertTag(t *testing.
